      • ifStringInList

        public static boolean ifStringInList(java.lang.String s,
                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayList)
        Judge if the ArrayList contains the String variable
        参数:
        s -
        arrayList -
        返回:
        If a String in ArrayList contains the variable return true

      • ifStringExactlyInList

        public static boolean ifStringExactlyInList(java.lang.String s,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayList)
        Judge if the ArrayList contains the String variable
        参数:
        s -
        arrayList -
        返回:
        If only a String in ArrayList equals the variable return true
